All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AgentieImobiliara
Reprezintă o agenție imobiliară care gestionează anunțuri și tranzacții.
Airplane
The class with which seats on an airplane are automatically reserved.
Anunt
Clasa reprezinta un anunt imobiliar.
Apartament
Reprezinta un apartament care poate fi pus spre vanzare de catre agentia imobiliara.
ArithmeticMean
The class calculates and displays the arithmetic mean of two or more numbers read from a file.
BankAccount
This class represents a bank account object.
BasicExercises
This class contains a set of basic exercises in java.
Bus
This class represents a bus object.
Calculator
This class represents a basic calculator made in Java Swing.
Card
This record represents a card.
Card.Suit
This enum represents the suits of the cards.
Circle
Represents a circle.
Complex
This class represents a complex number and contains operations on it.
Contact
This class represents a contact object.
ContactList
This class represents a list of Contact objects.
Contract
Reprezinta un contract de vanzare-cumparare pentru un apartament.
Course
This class represents a course.
CrazyEightsGame
This class holds the functionality of the Crazy Eights Game.
DiscountCalculation
The interface offers methods for applying discounts to products in the store.
Exam
Represents an exam.
Exercises
This class contains methods with arrays and ArrayList.
Exercises
Contains basic exercises with working with files.
Game
This class represents a game.
IntegersArray
This class creates an array object with integers and operations on it.
Matrix
This class creates a matrix object and performs operations on it.
Minibus
This class represents a minibus object.
OperatingSystem
This class represents an operating system object.
OverloadedMethods
This class contains overloaded methods.
PigLatin
The class takes a text from the "in.txt" file and translates the sentences written in Romanian into another language called “pig Latin”.
PizzaOrder
This class represents a calculator for the total of a pizza order.
Player
This class represents a player who plays a card game.
Product
This class represents a product object.
Professor
This class represents a professor.
ProgrammingLanguage
This class represents a programming language product.
Proprietar
Reprezinta noul proprietar al apartamentului.
Rational
This class represents a rational number object.
Receipt
This class represents a receipt.
Round
This interface is used to round numbers.
ShoppingList
This class represents a shopping list.
SoftwareProduct
This class represents a software product.
StatCalc
The class takes a data set and calculates the number of elements, sum of elements, mean, minimum, maximum and standard deviation.
Student
This class represents a student.
TaxCalculation
The interface contains methods for calculating taxes for a vehicle.
Test
Tests the functionality of the CrazyEightsGame class.
Test
A company sells software products and has divided the products into the following categories: operating systems, utilities, games and programming languages.
Test
A company sells large vehicles: trucks, buses and minibuses, produced in the country or abroad.
